name: Blood Samurai
description:
A long time ago, after the death of Emperor Nakatomi Shigeaki without an heir, the Eastern Empire disintegrated and fell into turbulent times. The political power of the empire was held by a series of military dictators and feudal lords known as the Shoguns and Daimyos. The Shoguns and Daimyos slaughtered each other, leaving the once prosperous land in the region covered in blood for hundreds of years.

After hundreds of years of civil war, the Kanagi clan with their Blood Samurais defeated small clans of the North and controlled the vast northern. After many consecutive wins. The Blood Samurais of the Kanagi clan had secured victory at hand and the unification of the Eastern Empire was only a matter of time.



FEATURES:


  • Intriguing Storyline.
  • Female Protagonist.
  • In-depth Battle System.
  • Beautiful Graphics.
  • Attractive Gameplay.
  • High Difficulty.
  • Diverse and Attractive Skill System.

Kanagi Risako - Shogun

Kanagi Risako is the leader of the Blood Samurai that govern the vast territories of the north. With her ingenious leadership, she and her Blood Samurai continuously won victory after victory. The unification of the Eastern Empire was now only a matter of time. However, with the arrival of the Dark Legion, her Blood Samurai were killed one by one. She managed to escape but she almost lost everything. With determination and courage, she decides to find the survivors with the desire to defeat the Dark Legion to save her homeland.

Arakaki Aiga - Warlord

Arakaki Aiga - A derelict samurai. Used to be in a family that was a branch of the Kanagi family. However, after losing the city, this family was also destroyed, Arakaki Aiga was forced to wander around. However, after once rescuing Kanagi Risako while clashing with another clan. Kanagi Risako saw her talent and respected her as a close-up.

Kimura Akasuki - Swordmaster

Kimura Akasuki is one of the greatest bandits. She is the leader of the Akasuki clan, where the most brutal bandits gather. However, her clan was unable to resist the invasion of the Dark Legion. With the sweep of the Dark Legion, her most bloodthirsty warriors were annihilated one after another. She was lucky to escape and then she met Kanagi Risako. Wishing to defeat the Dark Legion to avenge her lost brothers, she accompanies Kanagi Risako even though the two were once enemies.

Nagasawa Eire - Ninja

Nagasawa Eire is a genius female ninja. She was adopted by a ninja clan with a long tradition, ruling a large area in the south. From the darkness, she appeared and attacked the enemy with a speed faster than the wind, causing the enemy to die without knowing what had happened. She grew up in a harsh environment and was taught to be loyal and brave. Growing up, she became a trustworthy leader and was assigned to command the battle and protection of the clan.
